#summary Tools Overview

=Tools Overview=

= ver 1.x.x (ENVI add-on)=
|| LAS File Utilities || Process/Manipulate LAS files||	
|| -  [LASFileInfo Get LAS Header Info] || Displays header and projection information for an LAS file ||
|| -  [LASFileInfo Get LAS Data Info] || Displays descriptive data statistics for LAS file(s) ||
|| -  [AddProject Add Projection to LAS File(s)] || Adds embedded projection information to LAS files ||
|| -  [ReprojectLAS Reproject LAS File(s)] || Converts existing LAS files into a new map projection ||
|| -  [AsciiToLAS Convert Ascii Data to LAS] || Converts text point data into LAS format lidar files ||
|| -  [LAStoAscii Convert LAS Data to Ascii/Shapefile] || Converts LAS format lidar files into delimited text or ESRI Shapefile point data ||
|| -  [BoundaryLAS Create Boundary EVF/SHP/KML] || Creates an vector file (EVF, shape or KML) that shows the boundaries of the data ||
|| -  [BufferLAS Buffer LAS Files] || Geographically buffers the data using neighboring files ||
|| -  [TileLAS Tile LAS File(s)] || Divides one or more files into multiple tiles ||
|| -  [ReclassifyLAS Reclassify LAS File(s)] || Reassigns new classification to old classes of LAS files ||
|| -  [DecimateLAS Decimate LAS File(s)] || Decimates the points the data file ||
|| -  [SubsetLAS Subset LAS File(s)] || Subset LAS files by coordinates or image/ROI ||
|| - -  [SubsetLASCoord Subset via Coordinates] || Subsets data files according to user coordinates ||
|| - -  [SubsetLASRoi Subset via Image/ROI] || Subsets data files using a reference image and/or regions of interest ||
|| -  [ExportLAS Export LAS File(s)] || Export LiDAR returns by return number, number of returns, classes, elevation, intensity, and scan angle ||
|| -  [AssignRGB Assign RGB Channel Data] || Assigns RGB channel data from multi-band images, elevation color, or vegetation height color, to LAS 1.2 files ||
|| -  [FlightLines Extract Flight Lines] || Extract flight lines from LAS file(s) using GPS time information ||
|| [HeightFiltering Perform Height Filtering] || Performs vegetation filtering on the data ||
|| [BareDEM Create Bare-earth DEM] || Creates bare-earth digital terrain model from height-filtered LAS file(s) ||
|| Create Raster Products || Create various topographic, intensity and vegetation raster products ||
|| -  [TopoBare Create Topographic Products (Bare-earth)] || Creates various raster topographic bare-earth products ||
|| -  [TopoAll Create Topographic Products (All returns)] || Creates various raster topographic products from all point data||
|| -  [VegProducts Create Vegetation Products] || Creates various raster vegetation products  ||
|| -  [IntensityProducts Create Intensity Products] || Creates various raster intensity products  ||
|| -  [PrepareLAS Prepare LAS file(s)] || Add vegetation height information to the LAS file(s) from existing bare-earth digital terrain model ||
|| [RasterizeLAS Rasterize Lidar Data (Legacy)] || Converts raw point data into various raster products||
|| [HeightGroups Create Vegetation Height Groups] || Separate input LAS file into user-specified vegetation height groups ||
|| [ProfileLAS Create Elevation Profile(s)] || Creates one or more elevation profiles along a user-defined transect ||
|| [3DViewer 3D Lidar Viewer] || An interactive viewer for displaying lidar point data ||
==ver 2.x.x (IDL Virtual Machine Application)==
